section.p: This section lists and describes all relevant clinical problems at the time the document is generated. At a minimum, all pertinent current and historical problems should be listed. Overall health status may be represented in this section.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7877, CONF:1198-10440, CONF:1198-32511 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15407)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15408, CONF:1198-31141)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7881, CONF:1198-15505)
Conforms to Problem Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-30481, CONF:1198-30482)
Conforms to Health Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15407)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15408, CONF:1198-31141)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7879, R2.1=CONF:1198-7879)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7880, R2.1=CONF:1198-7880)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7881, CONF:1198-15505)
Conforms to Problem Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3:2015-08-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-30481, CONF:1198-30482)
Conforms to Health Status Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5:2014-06-09)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7877 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5"
Consol Problem Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15407)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15408)
Consol Problem Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7879, R2.1=CONF:1198-7879)
Consol Problem Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7880, R2.1=CONF:1198-7880)

Consol Problem Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7882) Conforms to Problem Concern Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3)
